string.text: You need to bring tools to Shurup so that he can upgrade equipment.

You know, bro, I'm actually pretty good at mechanics. I can repair weapons and armor, and I can even do some upgrades! Well, I would do them if the tools were normal. But where can you get them here? Maybe you could help me get a simple set?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should have tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it for me, I'll be grateful, I might even pay you!.. Maybe.
Great, dude! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
You need to bring Shurup tools for delicate work. He needs a more complete set to carry out more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, dude, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me out, pal?
I need tools for delicate work. It should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get it for me!

Wow, thanks, buddy! Now I'm definitely going to get rich. Damn, I'm going to be successful!.. Well, if I don't miss this opportunity. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
You need to bring %s to Shurup. He needs a unique set to carry out even more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, guy, if you find something worthwhile, I'll give you a discount!
I need tools for calibration. It should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them for me!

No way...! Damn, thanks bro! Now I will definitely get rich. Hell, I will become successful!... If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
